last_episode_to_air.name: Hidden Agenda
last_episode_to_air.overview: A car bombing leaves two people dead and the FBI singles out a problematic Columbia student as the suspect. However, Ironside’s suspicions fall elsewhere and a deadly game of cat and mouse lands himself and the team at risk when the bomber strikes again.

name: Ironside
overview: In the gritty world of the NYPD, no one's tougher than Detective Robert Ironside. He and his trusted, handpicked team of specialists will do whatever it takes to solve New York's most difficult and notorious crimes - even if it means breaking the rules. As a detective, his instincts are second to none, and those around him have to stay on their toes if they want to keep up...because when his spine was shattered by a bullet two years ago, Ironside swore he'd never let a damn wheelchair slow him down.
tagline: His team. His town. His rules.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Undeterred by a spinal injury that leaves him confined to a wheelchair, Detective Robert Ironside leads his elite, handpicked team on a hunt to find a young broker's killer.

episodes.name: Sleeping Dogs
episodes.overview: The team's hunt for a vengeful serial killer takes an unexpected turn when a missing person resurfaces and a new case emerges.

episodes.name: Action
episodes.overview: Ironside's team investigates a string of heists at high-stakes underground poker games. Meanwhile, Teddy and Virgil's working relationship strains the investigation, threatening everyone's safety.

episodes.name: Uptown Murders
episodes.overview: Ironside and his team, including Virgil, Holly and Teddy race the clock to clear the murder of a New York University honor student, before a plea bargain will set a hit man free. In the process, Ironside seeks Gary’s expertise, but being back in that mindset could prove too much for him to handle.

episodes.name: Hell on Wheels
episodes.overview: What started as a wild rooftop chase quickly turns into a homicide investigation when the team discovers severed body parts in a garbage bag. When additional victims surface across the city, Ironside, Holly, Teddy and Virgil track the case that leads to the doors of a notorious motorcycle gang and a femme fatale.

episodes.name: Pentimento
episodes.overview: Ironside is forced to come to terms with a mistake that has haunted him for years; Virgil must recover from a violent incident.

episodes.name: Minor Infractions
episodes.overview: When a student from the wrong side of the tracks is kidnapped off a bus, it becomes apparent to Ironside and the team that the wrong kid was snatched. The race to rescue the hostage leads to a ransom payment of rare comic books and a teenage computer whiz. Meanwhile, through flashbacks, Ironside rekindles unpleasant memories from the past involving his father.

episodes.name: Brothers In Arms
episodes.overview: Fleet Week in New York City goes awry when two marines and a seaman find themselves on the run after a pimp and prostitute wind up dead. As the team races to find the soldiers before a vicious street gang does, Ironside finds himself at odds with Capt. Rollins, who is grappling with demons of his own time in Iraq.

episodes.name: Hidden Agenda
episodes.overview: A car bombing leaves two people dead and the FBI singles out a problematic Columbia student as the suspect. However, Ironside’s suspicions fall elsewhere and a deadly game of cat and mouse lands himself and the team at risk when the bomber strikes again.
